select * from (select b.*, rownum rn from (select a.account_id_fk, max(exec_dtm) exec_dtm from DDL_HISTORY, crew a where a.USER_ID_FK = #{user_id} group by a.account_id_fk order by exec_dtm desc)b) where rn >= (#{page}-1) * #{pageSize} + 1 and rn <= #{page} * #{pageSize}
select action_event, object_type, object_name, sql_text, exec_dtm from DDL_HISTORY where object_owner = #{object_owner} order by exec_dtm desc

select * from (select a.*, rownum rn from (select action_event, object_type, object_name, sql_text, exec_dtm from DDL_HISTORY where object_owner = upper(#{object_owner}) order by exec_dtm desc)a) where rn >= (#{page}-1) *#{pageSize} + 1 and rn <= #{page}*#{pageSize}
